Magic Notes:
Bend Luck: Spend 2 Sorcery Points to add or subtract 1d4 from target roll
Careful Spell: Spend 1 Sorcery Point to protect 3 creature(s) from your spell
Controlled Chaos: Re-roll wild magic surge effect
Distant Spell: Spend 1 Sorcery Point to dbl spell range or touch at 30'
Draconic Presence: R60' Spend 5 Sorcery Points for awe and fear aura for conc or 1 min (Wis neg)
Elemental Adept (Cold): Spells ignore cold resistance, treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Elemental Adept (Fire): Spells ignore fire resistance, treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Elemental Affinity: +3 HP damage with ancestry type, spend 1 Sorcery Point for 1 hr resistance
Empowered Spell: Spend 1 Sorcery Point to re-roll 3 spell damage dice
Extended Spell: Spend 1 sorcery point to dbl spell duration
Flexible Casting: Convert Sorcery Points to and from spell slots
Font Of Magic: 20 Sorcery Points/long rest
Heightened Spell: Spend 3 Sorcery Points for target Disadv on spell save
Quickened Spell: Spend 2 Sorcery Points to cast spell as bonus action
Sorcerous Restoration: Regain 4 Sorcery Points/short rest
Spell Bombardment: Add another die when max rolled 1/tn
Subtle Spell: Spend 1 Sorcery Point to cast w/out somatic or verbal components
Twinned Spell: Spend spell level Sorcery Points to add second target
Wild Magic Surge: 5% chance of random magic effect
Notes
* Ability Boosts: +1 Dexterity
